    • Method Detail

      • addDirectives

        public void addDirectives(UserAgentDirectives directives)
        Store set of directives
        Parameters:
        directives - The set of directives to add to this host

      • allows

        public boolean allows(java.lang.String path)
        Check if the host directives allows visiting path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to check
        Returns:
        True if the path is not disallowed, false if it is

      • checkAccess

        public int checkAccess(java.lang.String path)
        Check if any of the rules say anything about the specified path
        Parameters:
        path - The path to check
        Returns:
        One of ALLOWED, DISALLOWED or UNDEFINED

      • disallows

        public boolean disallows(java.lang.String path)
        Check if the host directives explicitly disallow visiting path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to check
        Returns:
        True if the path is explicity disallowed, false otherwise

      • getLastAccessTime

        public long getLastAccessTime()

      • needsRefetch

        public boolean needsRefetch()

      • setUserAgent

        public void setUserAgent(java.lang.String userAgent)
        Change the user agent string used to crawl after initialization. This will reorder (recreate) the list of user agent directives for this host.
        Parameters:
        userAgent - The new user agent to use.
